name: Princess SPA Salon - Girl Dress up & Makeover Game
name_original: Princess SPA Salon - Girl Dress up & Makeover Game
description:
SPA!
Makeup!
Fashion!
Beauty!
Every girl loves to be fashion star.
In the Facial Spa & Dress up girl game, your task is to let the little princess become the most beautiful girl!
Now it's time to apply SPA!First, make the princess more relaxing, select the right spa tools to clean her face, make a cool fashion hairstyle.After then, she will come to a beautiful makeup room, show your makeover and design skills, choose every outfit that more suitable her style, and jewelry and other accessories to makeover her.

Enjoy this girl game.
